channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- iNotes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- iNotes

item.title: CVE-2017-1327|2024-08-05T13:32:29.282Z -- ibm -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 126062.

item.title: CVE-2017-1421|2024-08-05T13:32:29.606Z -- ibm -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2017-1214|2024-08-05T13:25:17.535Z -- ibm -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes 8.5 and 9.0 could allow a remote attacker to send a malformed email to a victim, that when opened could cause an information disclosure. IBM X-Force ID: 123854.

item.title: CVE-2017-1332|2024-08-05T13:32:29.303Z -- ibm -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 126234.
